nodes.text: Jitfruit was a type of fruit that possessed a puckered appearance. While on the Outer Rim planet Batuu around 34 ABY, the former farmer Dolin traveled home to visit his grandmother, Grana, for the first time since joining the Resistance to fight against the First Order. Dolin discerned Grana's displeasure at his return from her facial expression, which he felt appeared as puckered as a jitfruit.
Jitfruit was first mentioned in Galaxy's Edge: Black Spire, a 2019 novel written by Delilah S. Dawson.
